Description: "Tree seedlings were planted in 4 different microsites and 2 different herbivory treatments. After one year in the field surviving seedlings were harvested and measured for height
"Total leaf area was measured with a LI-3100G Leaf area meter
All seedlings started at a height of 20 cm, final height measured with a ruler.

Seedlings were dried at room temperature for a month in paper bages and then weighed
  for leaf biomess, stem biomass and root biomass.
